rows.label: qst701802_msg0001
rows.name:
The materials are all here.
Let's get started right away.

rows.label: qst701802_msg0004
rows.name:
I keep poking my fingers!
And if you look closely at
the emblem... it's hard!!

rows.label: qst701802_msg0006
rows.name:
You're clumsy. Why not
try something simpler?

rows.label: qst701802_msg0008
rows.name:
Even if it's hard, I have to do
it. I can't afford to be spoiled.

rows.label: qst701802_msg0009
rows.name: You don't have to be so stubborn.

rows.label: qst701802_msg0011
rows.name:
You're probably thinking, "I'll get
it someday." But how do you know
tomorrow will be the same as today?

rows.label: qst701802_msg0012
rows.name:
It's too late to regret it
after you've lost everything.

rows.label: qst701802_msg0014
rows.name:
...Well then, shall I
make a sample for you?

rows.label: qst701802_msg0015
rows.name:
I will embroider the Iiran emblem on
the talisman I always make. You can
use that as a sample and try again.
